artist: Robert Rauschenberg; Publisher: Universal Limited Art Editions (ULAE)
creditline: The Francisca S. Winston Fund, by exchange
image_copyright: Robert Rauschenberg, Front Roll, 1964 © Robert Rauschenberg Foundation
signed: Signed, dated in pencil, LR: RAUSCHENBERG 1964
text: This print represents a second method that Rauschenberg devised for transferring existing images onto lithographic stones. In this case, commercial photoscreenprints were prepared from Rauschenberg's own photographs and other images. Lithographic tusche, a liquefied inky substance, was screened directly onto the printing stone, which was then prepared in the normal manner. Front Roll is one of four editioned lithographs that Rauschenberg completed at U.L.A.E. during May-June, 1964.
title: Front Roll
